title: Suspect Arrested After Four Shot In DeSoto County
content:
Error loading player: No playable sources found
OLIVE BRANCH, MS
The DeSoto County Sheriff's Department is investigating a shooting that injured four people Wednesday night.
It happened at a home at 928 Cross Road in Olive Branch, Mississippi.
All four victims were treated for injuries. Their identities have not being released.
Deputies arrested Keatron Walls of Walls, Mississippi. he is charged with four counts of aggravated assault and one count of shooting into an occupied dwelling.
